page.title: 04A schoolday in Stickney.
page.content: At 7a.m. every week day I get up and get dressed.I go downstairs for my breakfast. After breakfast I clean my shoes and get my packed lunch ready for school.This consists of sandwiches, crisps, biscuits and a drink of orange. At 8.25 my dad takes me to school.We play outside until 9 am.In that time we play football. When a whistle is blown everybody lines up and the teacher comes round to each class which has its own line.She tells us to go into class for lessons up to 10.30a.m..Then we go out to play for 15 minutes and come in at 10.45 a.m.When we come in from play we do maths cards or other work such as writing a story or english work cards.We go into the hall at 12 o'clock for our lunch.when we have eaten our lunch we go outside to play for 45 minutes.
